summary: When fortuneteller convinces Colleen that her boyfriend, Dick, is cheating on her, she decides to put a stop to it. After Colleen accidentally kills Dick, mafia hit-man Daniel offers to take credit for the murder.
cast: Sarah Jessica Parker|Harry Connick Jr.|Johnny Knoxville|Craig Ferguson|Teri Garr|Geoffrey Blake|John Eddins|Brigid Brannagh|David Cross|Jon Sklaroff|Brad Grunberg|David Koechner|Claudia Schiffer|Erik Palladino|Ever Carradine|Heidi Mark|Lee Garlington|Holmes Osborne|Michael Hitchcock|John Henson|Sean Howse|Matt O'Toole|Ian Patrick Williams|Don McMillan|Tim Gingras|Kate Flannery|Hillary Weaver|David Rosen|Elwood Hampton|Michael Calder|Patrick Coleman Duncan|Rosemary Garris|Earl Maddox|La Shon Malone|Dave Schuetz
title: Algo más que cómplices
